Refund.Title: Charging Refund [Subscriber Number = {{msisdn}}]
Refund.RefundConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to refund {{amount}} {{currency}} amount for the charging record with this transaction ID {{transactionId}}?
Refund.RefundedSuccessfully: {{amount}} {{currency}} amount for the charging with this transaction ID {{transactionId}} and timestamp {{timestamp}} has been refunded successfully.
Refund.ItemIsNotRefundable: Charging with this transaction ID {{transactionId}} is not refundable!

TableColumnsTooltips.Date: Date and time of the event.
TableColumnsTooltips.ChargingEventDate: Date and time of the charging event.
TableColumnsTooltips.Dcs:
Data Coding Scheme. Possible values are:
  • 0: SMSC Default Alphabet,
  • 1: IA5 (CCITT T.50)/ASCII (ANSI X3.4),
  • 2: Octet unspecified (8-bit binary),
  • 3: Latin 1 (ISO-8859-1),
  • 4: Octet unspecified (8-bit binary),
  • 5: JIS (X 0208-1990),
  • 6: Cyrllic (ISO-8859-5),
  • 7: Latin/Hebrew (ISO-8859-8),
  • 8: UCS2 (ISO/IEC-10646),
  • 9: Pictogram Encoding,
  • 10: ISO-2022-JP (Music Codes),
  • 11: Reserved,
  • 12: Reserved,
  • 13: Extended Kanji JIS(X 0212-1990),
  • 14: KS C 5601,
  • 15: Reserved.
